verses.roman:
svarūpa, jagadānanda, kāśīśvara, śaṅkara
cāri-jana pariveśana kare nirantara

synonyms: svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; kāśīśvara—Kāśīśvara; śaṅkara—Śaṅkara; cāri-jana—four men; pariveśana kare—administer; nirantara—continuously.
translation: The four men-Svarūpa, Jagadānanda, Kāśīśvara and Śaṅkara-distributed the prasāda continuously.
